nPreSweeps.title: nPreSweeps
nPreSweeps.description: number of sweeps as the algorithm is coarsening

preSweepsLevelMultiplier.title: preSweepsLevelMultiplier
preSweepsLevelMultiplier.description: multiplier for the the number of sweeps between each coarsening level

maxPreSweeps.title: maxPreSweeps
maxPreSweeps.description: maximum number of sweeps as the algorithm is coarsening

nPostSweeps.title: nPostSweeps
nPostSweeps.description: number of sweeps as the algorithm is refining

postSweepsLevelMultiplier.title: postSweepsLevelMultiplier
postSweepsLevelMultiplier.description: multiplier for the the number of sweeps between each refinement level

maxPostSweeps.title: maxPostSweeps
maxPostSweeps.description: maximum number of sweeps as the algorithm is refining

nFinestSweeps.title: nFinestSweeps
nFinestSweeps.description: number of sweeps at finest level
